title: Dr. Meeyoug Cha (PhD，08) research work on New York Times
content:
Dr. Meeyoung Cha's recent research work is on New York Times.
Dr. Meeyoung Cha is a graduate of CS KAIST, under advisor Prof. Sue Moon. Her recent work "Measuring User Influence in Twitter: The Million Follower Fallacy"  caught the eyes of NY Times.
See the article
